subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Olympic Games (2010)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Russia, led by Alex Ovechkin, is seeking its first gold medal in hockey since a unified team won in 1992 after the demise of the Soviet Union.
snippet: Russia, led by Alex Ovechkin, is seeking its first gold medal in hockey since a unified team won in 1992 after the demise of the Soviet Union.
